titleInfo.title: Beiträge zur Shannonschen Informationstheorie im Falle nichtstationärer Kanäle

mods.abstract: Coding theorem and strong converse of the coding theorem are proved for nonstationary semicontinous channels and for almost periodic channels with unknown phase. More general cases are considered.

originInfo.publisher: Springer Science and Business Media LLC
